website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you want a machine that can fill the air with numerous bubbles at once and aren't easily annoyed by noisy toys.
pros: Excites youngsters with a blast of bubbles by simply pushing a button
Reservoir is large and easy to fill
Recycle tray reduces waste of bubble solution
cons: Runs on 6 AA batteries that you'll have to purchase separately
Loud when running, which is likely to bother parents more than kids

customer_reviews.title: 1 time use only
customer_reviews.text: As you can see the blower is not strong enough and it runs through the bottle quick. it worked grate the 1st time once i tried to use it the second time it was not blowing as much maybe 2 bubbles at a time this is the 3rd time and absolutely nothing. No bubbles at all smh i had high hopes for this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it but me... not so much. Its loud and a bubble guzzler Edit: it just stopped working after maybe 4 times of use. It blows only a few bubbles. I cleaned it out and still no luck. We are returning
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I tried this iten the day I got it. It was a huge disappointment. I would post a video of it not blowing bubbles, but my review may be rejected again. Packaging is unsavable once you open it, so item is unreturnable. I am out of $21 for this item. Do not buy it. It is horrible
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my great granddaughter and had it shipped to her house--sadly it only would spin and not blow bubbles---unfort it is too late to send it back so I am out of luck for money back
customer_reviews.author: Runfree50

customer_reviews.title: Best Bubble Machine!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had other machines from this brand and they didn’t seem to last very long. I debated on buying another one but I’m so glad I did! This machine is easy to clean, has a designated spot for recycled solution to pour back into the machine or back into the bottle of bubbles, and makes TONS of bubbles! I took the small bottle that came with it and twisted it onto the top and it seemed to make the bubbles last longer. We are so happy that we bought this one!
customer_reviews.author: Bay Rae Day

customer_reviews.title: BUBBLES EVERYWHERE!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for my son's 1st birthday, it's amazing! We bought a second one after my bozo dog broke the first one and the new design is more user friendly with the bubble solution catch and reuse section. It really makes GAZILLIONS of bubbles! I'm pretty sure my Frenchie loves this more than my son!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Eckmann

customer_reviews.title: So many bubbles!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used the other bubble machines from this brand and this is by far the best! It’s not quite but it blasts out a lot of bubbles for longer than we thought it would. Bubble solution is recycled and it’s so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: mOmmabear P

customer_reviews.title: Hastle to work with
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this brand. I appreciate that they enclosed the motor so it doesn't get damaged, but the place to put bubbles, on the top, is a pain I the butt. It has to have the bottle with the open lid (comes with it) and they pour out so fast you have to refill it every 5-8 minutes. I can't do that while holding my newborn. You have to take off the top section that spins, then take off the middle section that collects the extra bubbles, then pour back into the bottle (first taking off that lid) then keep clearing out the bubbles that are blowing up while pouring into the bottle. It's a pain the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: So worth it but bubble liquid doesn't last long. Cant control speed
customer_reviews.text: My sister bought this one and my little one loves it. It does shoot out a lot of bubbles at once so the liquid that comes with the bubble machine doesn't last long. However you dont have to buy this brand of liquid. Any kind of bubble liquid will work. The "recycle solution" can get a little messy so clean up is a bit of a pain but so worth it to see how happy my 1yr old gets. Only bad thing is you cant control the speed.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Perez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I would send this back if I could. I didn't use it until after the return period. The top was slightly bent so I had to bend it to "fix" it but it is terrible beyond that problem. I have another machine from this same brand that I love, but this design and quality are terrible. It is LOUD. It works on and off, and the solution pours through it. It doesn't self recycle the solution. It just collects it in the bottom of the machine. They you have to deal with it. I recommend the Tornado model... MUCH BETTER. I wish I could return this one. The sound alone is enough of a reason not to buy. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles. Bubbles Everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Does your child like bubbles? If so, this is the product for them! Due to extreme heat, we used this machine indoors. Our house was filled with bubbles. (Side note - super huge mess and slickness everywhere, but we knew it would happen). My son was in heaven. This machine shoots out a lot of bubbles in multiple directions. Only thing to be aware of... it sucks through a lot of bubble formula. I would definitely buy this product again and recommend it to any toddler parents.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Wall

customer_reviews.title: Leaks down sides, undersized catch tray. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept of this product but it has a design flaw. The catch-tray is smaller than the dispenser, so it leaks down the sides of the bubble machine. I’m less concerned about losing bubbles, but I shouldn’t have to lay paper towels around and underneath the product. It will slip out of you hand, that’s how much it leaks down the sides. The catch-tray should be slightly wider and this will fix the leaking issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C. Rochon

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Gazillion bubbles is my absolute favorite bubble solution (yes I tested a bunch lol) so I figured their bubble machine would be awesome. It doesn’t work. At all. I spent an hour trying all different things to try to get it to work and no bubbles! I even did it on a hot day vs a cool day. I would return it except you have to destroy the box to open it up. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: megthemaker

customer_reviews.title: Had 2 different ones and neither worked
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! I had two both were defective. The first one I received had a bad motor with bad spots in it and couldn't turn the blades of the fan. The second one I received just dropped bubble solution onto the blades and sprayed it out everywhere. Terrible design! Stick with the Hurricane machine! We had one for 8 years and was replacing it with the new design. Don't fall for the new shiny design. Stick with the reliable one!
customer_reviews.author: shieldbr

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!!! WON'T TURN ON!!
customer_reviews.text: We had the small version of this blower and it died after only a few uses, so my husband decided to order the bigger one because it was supposed to be a better design......well......let me tell you how ticked off he was to open it and find out it won't even turn on!! Brand new batteries out of the package and all, doesn't work! Way to quality control Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Farrah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s certainly makes allot of bubbles - however, you can only use a small amount of bubble solution at a time. So you have to sit near it and constantly refill it. It probably uses a couple tablespoons of solution. It runs out fast and you have to babysit it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We had a gazillion bubbles from Costco previously. We loaned it to my son's preschool (they thought we were giving it to them and I didn't correct them) so I upgraded to this one. I like it better. Its much cleaner and easier to use. Makes so many bubbles. Be sure to have a gallon of bubbles handy. It doesn't work with homemade bubbles, at least not mine. It just gets foamy.
customer_reviews.author: Suffelli

customer_reviews.title: Only good for 1-3 uses than junk
customer_reviews.text: I got this because so many people recommended it! It was so awesome the first use! So many bubbles than after than the amount of bubbles just got less and less now it does t even spit out more than 2-3 bubbles at a time! Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this bubble machine. Had it for less than a month and it just randomly stopped working. You cannot use different bubbles than the one that comes with it because if you do the bubbles do not actually form and blow away from the machine. Very loud and poorly made. If I could return this item I would.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B.

customer_reviews.title: Makes So Many Bubbles!
customer_reviews.text: My Great-granddaughter loves this machine. And when paired with the same brand bubble solution it produces tones of bubbles. If there is any downside it is that it does not run very long on a single fill. I have to refill several times during a play session. I guess that is standard with this type machine - being that it is a kids toy and not a professional device used by party companies. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time or money
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to get this product, but it was a total let down. The motor is powerful but the wand doesn’t produce. Only had some bubbles on the floor & not all over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it works
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same one from Walmart last year it held up all summer, this year Walmart is selling the smaller ones (they don't blow the bubbles out) I got this from Amazon thinking I would have it all summer for the kids, however once all set up it starts going won't blow the bubbles then the motor turns off. Maybe I got a defected one because I loved mine last year I'm just giving up this year.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: This will churn out a lot of bubbles in a short amount of time. I love that it has a reservoir to collect the excess bubble solution so you can reuse them. It's very easy to clean - the motor, the collection reservoir, and the wand/fan segments are separate, which makes it easy to clean without damaging the mechanical parts.
customer_reviews.author: Millia Z

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was surprise that I couldn’t put the bubble solution in and it run for much longer. The Bubbles only last for about a minute. You then have to keep recycling the bubble solution. If you are hosting a BBQ or even a kids party, you do not have time to keep doing this. The bubbles are pretty; however the process is a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: A. Holder

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Do not spend your money, this will die after a few uses, we had it replaced and the second bubble machine also died unfortunately our return window closed to do a second return and now we are stuck with a useless bubble machine and 6 lts of bubble juice.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus_gal

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It was great for about 3 days. It is a mess and stopped producing bubbles. They pop before releasing so the kids cannot enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: pennalu

customer_reviews.title: Great bubble machine
customer_reviews.text: Great bubble machine, I really like that it reuses uses the dribbled solution. Take note that it will only make a really impressive amount of bubbles if you use the actual gazillion bubble solution. The cheaper solution doesn’t work very well in this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Marie

customer_reviews.title: The kids will love it and no bubbles go to waste
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s birthday party. The kids loved it of course! The bubble solution empties quick but I’m glad that no solution goes to waste bc there’s a part that collects the unused solution. Once the bubbles stop, you can put it back in the bottle and use it again.
customer_reviews.author: CAMI GARNER

customer_reviews.title: Defetive and useless
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave reviews but this machine got me so frustrated I couldn't just let anyone else buy it without warning them. I purchased this as a gift for my son's third birthday. He loves bubbles so much and the machine we had for four years gave out. So I ordered it, when it showed we opened it and he was so very excited. Put the batteries in and nothing. This machine was a rock, a piece of trash, completely useless. This brand was our favorite, it is the brand of the first machine we had that lasted so long. But this is completely unacceptable and I will think twice before buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles bubbles everywhere!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bubble maker brand never lets me down. This machine produces a lot of bubbles and my kids have a great time chasing them around. I purchased one a lot more expensive and it didn't even produce a 3rd of the bubbles this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Aleshia Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Makes Lots of Bubbles but SUPER loud
customer_reviews.text: This bubble machine works great. You get LOTS of bubbles. Possibly too many bubbles but my son loves it. My only complaint about it, is that it's super loud. Like so loud it's hard to have a conversation while it's running. Otherwise, the bubble machine works great and like I said my son loves chasing the bubbles around.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Newest Version, Recycles Bubbles!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this new version! There is a reservoir that recycles that bubbles that drip down. You can blow bubbles for hours and barely use one small 8oz container! The battery pack is finally safe from bubble leakage and you can enjoy bubbles with very little clean up. We rinse the unit when we're finished and store it for next time! I couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anaya

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a day
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used a birthday gift card to buy this bubble maker and this was a bad purchase decision. Within a day or two, this machine stopped working even though we have tried everything you could think of to make it work. The machine appears to operate normally, but no bubbles come out, or if they do, they last a fraction of a second and never rise off the machine. My daughter is very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the old version
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the old version but I love how they enclosed the motor so it can't get wet. It doesn't work well with having a bottle ontop of it so then you have to stand there and continuously add bubbles
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hart

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: the bubble machine is not working from the first time, all the bubbles are stick together on top of the machine, i think the blower below is not powerful enough to blow the bubbles away. disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LILY XU

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 10 days
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get fooled. This product is trash. It stopped working after a week and a half. Any good review is from someone who has only used it for a few days. It no longer produces any bubbles at all. At first, it looked like it would be amazing. It had so many bubbles, but every day there was less and less until it stopped making any at all. Don’t buy this or you will be returning it
customer_reviews.author: Darin Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Loved how easy it was to assemble this product! My 4 yo and 2 yo were thoroughly entertained by the literally gazillion bubbles it produced. It was handy to pour the unused bubble solution back into the bottle to reuse however it does go through provided bottle rather quickly so may be handy to have another bottle on hand. It did require AA batteries. Loved this product.
customer_reviews.author: Crob

customer_reviews.title: Hugely disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work at all. Not powerful enough. Absolute garbage. Bought it for my daycare and the kids were bummed when it couldn’t even put out a single bubble. With their own special brand of bubble mix.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Saxe

customer_reviews.title: I'm sorry to say that I've bought this product twice and it failed me both times.
customer_reviews.text: The product runs out of bubbles very quickly as the "delivery" of bubbles is one of the small bottles and there isn't a way to use a bigger bottle for it. If used regularly, it runs out about every 15 minutes so someone is always calling mommy for a refill. Both times I bought this it gave out after the 3rd time using it. HUGE dissappointment for my five year old twins. When it runs it IS a lot of bubbles. I bought it once here and once at a club store.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after half hour of use.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after the first use. I set it up turned it on. Kids were excited. The played with it for maybe a half an hour. The next day, it turned on and wouldn’t blow any bubbles. It recycles the bubbles. So I poured that out and put in fresh bubble solution that I purchased. Same brand. It still didn’t work. It was short lived and now kids are no longer happy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Quality and easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned several of these and after seeing some of the reviews hesitated purchasing another one but I’m so glad I did. I don’t understand the negative reviews. I now own several of these and use it almost everyday for my business and it’s true quality and by far the best bubbles and tons of them! It’s also easy to clean! Wouldn’t have any other brand!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Loftus

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wrong item description!!! It says you can plug it in but that’s BS. It requires 6 batteries to power this crap. I bought it for my daughters first birthday because she loves bubbles and it was a total disappointment. I had a bunch of kids excited for a crap machine with false item description.
customer_reviews.author: Yessenia lozano

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The machine was super easy to assemble, but required way too many batteries for a toy so small. We set it up and it worked great but went through the bubbles quickly. When we poured the “recycled” bubbles back into the container and turned the machine back on, IT DIDN'T WORK! We let it dry out and tried again and still nothing. The bubble solution dropped into the machine, the wheel turned, and the fan was blowing, but NO BUBBLES! A complete waste of money and some very disappointed children!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bubble fun !
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love this bubble machine ! It makes so many bubbles. The reservoir that collects liquid overflow is a great idea. Cuts back on a lot of waste.
customer_reviews.author: Momof30

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, it made a lot of bubbles. I cleaned it, Now it only makes a little bit of bubbles not like when we 1st used it! My daughter loves bubbles and was very upset when it doesn’t make bubbles. Very unhappy!!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Set it up for a drive through for my grandson’s 7th birthday... Did not work. Two of his friends said they bought the same one and it didn’t work!!! Gee thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Raunigk

customer_reviews.title: It does make tons of bubbles
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a blanket of bubbles this is for you. Produces tons of bubbles! I bought this for my granddaughter but my daughter said she was more excited than the little one was 😉. Stock up on the bubble liquid because it goes through it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Melby

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. It works great. It does go through bubbles very quickly so that’s kind of a pain. But it does produce a lot of bubbles for them to play with.
customer_reviews.author: My Humble Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed toddler!
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. Even worse it was a huge disappointment for my toddler, who is running around the house begging for bubbles! This thing has a bubble solution catcher which I can justify the one star for. But if it actually blew out bubbles maybe it wouldn't even need the damn catcher. The top spins around distributing the solution to the bubble blower heads, the bubbles start to raise and then POP, never actually leaving the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up to the brand
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry to say I’m so disappointed in this item. Our first gazillion bubble machine was awesome! The two the I’ve bought after that have been garbage. They don’t blow bubbles well at all and are louder than our first one. It’s been a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Deonne m read

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun product that is easy to use. My great grands love it and its great to use in garage if, weather doesn`t permit outdoor play.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Paschall Stoltz

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bubble machine. I really like that the bubbles come out the top and blow up, most designs come out the side and blow down.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: bubble time
customer_reviews.text: I put this bubble machine on for my grandsons. My neighbor tells me she enjoys them also. It does blow tons of bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Constantly have to fill bubbles very loud and requires a ton of batteries. Spits out great amount of bubbles but only last a no it's until u have to refill the top..... anoying was disappointed after reading all the good reviews
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Walker

customer_reviews.title: This is a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for the finale of my clown show. I have a bucket that I put it in and it shoots bubbles up and fills the room. It's great! Also kid love it, everyone loves it! It was a good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nichols

customer_reviews.title: So many bubbles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Order a backup bottle of the bubble solution!! Once someone stabs a hole in it during unpacking, it's pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I owned the Monsoon, and it was much much better than this one.. I had to replace the liquid too many times during the party. I would rather invest in a more expensive yet versatile bubble blower next time.
customer_reviews.author: Hildegard B.

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit With Our Grandsons
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons just love getting packages addressed from Amazon. This was a huge hit! Nothing like a bubble machine that works well and you can run through the bubbles. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: The old design was better
customer_reviews.text: Bubbles don't last as long as their last design. Most of the liquid ends in the catch basin and you have to keep emptying It back into the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use and it was for a friend son for his birthday. He loved it and plays with it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Ebersole

customer_reviews.title: Not robust design
customer_reviews.text: First time trying it and there were no bubbles. Tried it the next day and there were tons of bubbles. No bubbles since then. I think it may be how the bubble solution gets distributed but can't figure out what exactly gets the bubbles going. I'm disappointed as I bought an earlier version that worked great but the battery compartment corroded.
customer_reviews.author: Hole

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Won’t blow bubbles at all. Has not worked properly at all since I opened it. Motor spins but bubble solution just sits there and nothing comes out. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Synetra Hughes

customer_reviews.title: My daughter thanks you.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves Gazillion bubbles from her initial one to this replacement I had to order, her most elated words pronounced had to be Bubbles! Grateful I found it on Amazon and had it shipped and received withing 22 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Naif J Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: This makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise for our grandchild. She loves it and laughs and has such a wonderful time.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L Ellison

customer_reviews.title: My Kids Loved This
customer_reviews.text: Its Very Fun But Also Very Messy LOL. But For My Kids Its Worth It. Id Advise Keeping The Fun Outside Though. For Me It Was Worth Every Penny. NO MORE MANUAL BUBBLE BLOWING FOR ME!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY R BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly!
customer_reviews.text: This thing goes through 6 batteries in about 5 hours of use. Then u have to continuously fill the tiny bubble bottle that produces (yes, alot) of bubbles for a solid 6-7 minutes. Then u have to stop what you are doing, go shut off machine to conserve batteries and add more bubble solution (very messy). Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: TRASH!!!! Blew one bubble, than no more!
customer_reviews.text: Such a waste of money! It literally blew one bubble, and after that, just foamed. I used the actual gazillion bubbles solution. And it runs really loud! I threw out the solution, let it dry, and then tried it again the next day. Same thing. Got one bubble and no more. My kids were so disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Nikki C

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a 4th of july party to the kids. It worked great for about 5 minutes, once the bubbles begin to collect at the top of the machine it no longer blows bubbles up and out. The collection of bubbles on the top of the machine just makes a soapy bubble mound and doesnt allow for any bubbles to float freely. Wouldnt buy this product ever again.
customer_reviews.author: nikki's child care

customer_reviews.title: Worked great first time, after that not so much
customer_reviews.text: This worked great the first time and then not so much after that. I'm not sure if you can only use their brand of bubbles? But tried different kinds of bubbles you normally find in the store and was only so so.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Horrible buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine to blow bubbles at my sons 3rd birthday. I took it out the box loosed the batter screws and inserted the batteries. Upon replacing the screw I was unable to secure the battery door so I taped it closed. I turned it on and .... well the video explains the rest. Total waste of money not 1 bubble flew from this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gramling

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Don't get this bubble machine. I have usually had good bubbles from the brand. This machine blew maybe 20 bubbles and stopped blowing any. The machine keeps going through the motions but the bottle of liquid drained out within minutes which must be why they put in such a substantial overflow container.
customer_reviews.author: BrSw

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bubble machine for my kids they were so excited when it arrived I put the batteries in and nothing, the item came defective or broken so I got a replacement, this one did work but only for the first use after that it would only blow one or two bubbles here and there I was so disappointed do not waste your time or money on this
customer_reviews.author: Mando

customer_reviews.title: Bubble Fun
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't disappoint! So much fun that friends and neighbors want one too!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Murray

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick! Lots of bubbles and the best part is you don’t have to use your own air power
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: very noisy company has poor customer service makes lots bubbles
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Poveromo

customer_reviews.title: Bubble mixture runs out and puddles in a reserve tank
customer_reviews.text: This model is not easy to use. You put the bubbles on as instructed and it does produce a lot of bubbles for about 30 seconds. After 30 seconds you have to disassemble the unit and pour more bubbles in that have been sitting in the “reserve tank.” I would return this item if I had the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Holt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love this mashing. It blows out massive amount of bubbles. Kids went crazy with it ...
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Barely worked! The button is difficult to turn the machine off with and the bubbles would only work once every few tries. By the end of the evening we used the whole container multiple times and it barely produced any bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. We are a big lover of the Gazillion bubbles brand having purchased a few of their machines and bubbles over the years. This one just doesn’t work well. Maybe I got a faulty one, but it just doesn’t have many bubbles. They all seem to pop in the machine without ever going out in the air.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Get the monsoon instead
customer_reviews.text: Makes half as many bubbles as the monsoon and has to be replenished every 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: M B.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it, stopped working 1 month after return window closed. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: casarodarte

customer_reviews.title: Tons of bubbles quick
customer_reviews.text: Love how many bubbles come out. It runs out fast and has to be refilled.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: No bubbles no fun
customer_reviews.text: I like the larger catch for the drips of the bubbles solution, but the machine blows very few bubbles if any at all. The design for getting the solution onto the wands does not work as good as their other machines. We got bubbles the first few seconds after turning it on, then the bubbles would only pop before released into the air.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Did not like that the bubbles did not work unless your stood over it pouring more bubble solution in it. Not as good as the other ones in this company and will have to return since it also spit out bubble solution all over around it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give less than a 1 star review, I would. I can’t return because the package is not salvageable once you open it. The purple wand gets stuck so it doesn’t work, and yes we’ve tried with multiple sets of batteries. This is a piece of junk & I’m very upset that I’m out $20 just to have to throw it in the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: So loud and wasteful
customer_reviews.text: It’s so loud, like brain rattling loud. And it used the whole bottle of bubbles in less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: rooster_ranch

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves bubbles. I bought it for her. It blows lots of bubbles and wears her out when I can't. Perfect. Also, don't put cheap bubbles in it they don't work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It broke or stopped working the same day I used it. It was knocked over and just stopped turning on.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Crawley

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t blow bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Quarantine fail. Kids and I were very disappointed when machine did not produce any bubbles. Fan did not push enough air to blow up bubbles (6 new energizer batteries were used).
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Leipprandt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the new design. The motor is protected on this one
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M

customer_reviews.title: This doesn’t work at all !!!! Do NOT Buy
customer_reviews.text: IT DONT WORK! DO NOT BUY THIS AT ALL !!!!! If I could rate it no stars then I would ! IT WOULDNT EVEN BLOW ANYTHING OUT .. FRESH BATTERIES AND ALL ! please PLEASE LISTEN TO THESE REVIEWS AND SAVE YOURSELF SOME TIME AND BUY A DIFFERENT BRAND .
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: This product was used. Broken and very dirty. It was a disgrace.
customer_reviews.author: Mystibrook

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Made my grand daughter very very happy.. great product with lots of laughs
customer_reviews.author: betty sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was the coolest and it didn’t work for my son party. Then it finally worked a little and now the button doesn’t work at all!
customer_reviews.author: Mvquester

customer_reviews.title: TONS OF BUBBLES & EASY TO CLEAN!!! So awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC!!! Gazillion bubbles is right! Bought it bc it says it was easily to clean and it surely is!!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly winn

customer_reviews.title: Throws lots of Bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter. She loves it. Throw lots of bubbles. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. My dogs even love chasing the bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: MemphisPharaoh

customer_reviews.title: Tons of bubbles
customer_reviews.text: This bubble machine makes a ton of bubbles! It truly lives up to its name! But is can suck down a bootle if bubble solution within two minutes. I liked the way it recycles the unused solution tone used again.
customer_reviews.author: The Emperor

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a little while
customer_reviews.text: We used it a couple of times and then it just stopped blowing bubbles. I cleaned it out as instructed but still didn’t work. When it did work it was easy to use. I have no idea what they mean by “thickness“. Overall, it was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t work right out of the box even with new batteries. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Breeden

product_meta.title: Gazillion Bubble Rush Bubble Blower Machine Bubbles for Kids, Purple/Green
product_meta.description: The Gazillion Bubble rush bubble machine is a high performance bubble blower with an innovative design that allows for easy clean up. With its revolutionary design, This high-powered bubble machine blows the most bubbles ever. This next generation bubble blower machine has a three-section no-spill modular design including a removable washable Top, solution recycling tray and batteries and motor sealed inside base. Simply pour solution into the reservoir and push the button for a bubble explosion in seconds. This bubble machine is designed to create hours of fun for kids, and easy clean for parents. Includes an 8 oz. Bottle of Gazillion premium bubbles solution. 6 AA batteries required, not included. Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Gazillion also offers bubble toys, bubble wands, and bubble bottles of solution.
feature_bullets: BLOWS BUBBLES STRAIGHT UP: The Gazillion Bubble Rush portable bubble machine is a high-powered bubble machine that blows thousands of bubbles straight up into the air
EASY TO CLEAN: Innovative bubble blower machine that is easy to clean for parents with a three-section no-spill modular design.
INCLUDES GAZILLION BUBBLE SOLUTION: Includes an 8oz. Bubble bottle of Gazillion solution
NO SPILL DESIGN: Includes a bubble solution recycling tray
OUTSIDE PLAY AND KIDS PARTIES: This is an ideal bubble machine for outdoor fun and kids parties. Great bubbles for toddlers. Works best with Gazillion bubble solution
REQUIRES BATTERIES: Requires 6 AA Batteries, not included
COLORS MAY VARY SLIGHTLY FROM SHOWN: Appropriate for ages 3+
